content: solar system saturn _____________________________________________________________________________________________________ crochet level advanced beginner/intermediate special stitches crochet terms us popcorn - make 5 double_crochet in same st remove hook and insert hook in top of first double_crochet grab loop and pull through this pattern is available in english only begpc - ch3 counts as your first double_crochet 4 double_crochet in same space remove hook and insert it in the 3rd chain of beg ch3 grab i made my square with sport yarn and crochet hook size loop and pull through 4 5 my square measures just over 5 ________________________________________________ with worsted weight yarn and crochet hook size 5 or 5 5mm your square should measure about 6 start with a magic_ring abbreviations magic_ring - magic_ring round 1 in magic_ring start with a begpc ch4 popcorn 3 times ch4 round - round close with a slip_stitch in top of begpc cut yarn 4 popcorn 4 ch4 space space - space skip - skip round 2 with new color stand double_crochet in any chain space 5 double_crochet in same stand - standing chain space 6 double_crochet in next chain space 3 times close with a slip_stitch in first st - stitch double_crochet cut yarn 24 double_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch yo - yarn over round 3 with new color stand double_crochet in any double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next st chain - chain repeat around to last st ch1 slip_stitch in first double_crochet to close cut single_crochet - single_crochet yarn 24 double_crochet 24 ch1 space half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet round 4 skip all double_crochet work only in chain space treble_crochet - treble_crochet with new color stand single_crochet in any chain space ch2 single_crochet in next chain space repeat around to last chain space ch2 slip_stitch in first single_crochet to close cut yarn 24 single_crochet 24 ch2 space round 5 skip all single_crochet work only in chain space with new color stand double_crochet in any chain space double_crochet in same chain space *2 half_double_crochet in next chain space 3 single_crochet in next chain space 2 half_double_crochet in next chain space 2 double_crochet in next chain space 2 treble_crochet ch2 2 treble_crochet in next chain space 2 double_crochet in next chain space* repeat from * to * around omitting the last 2 double_crochet close with a slip_stitch in first double_crochet and cut yarn 4 treble_crochet 4 double_crochet 4 half_double_crochet 3 single_crochet per side 1 corner chain space round 6 with new color stand single_crochet in any corner chain space single_crochet ch2 2sc in same chain space *single_crochet in each st across to next corner 2 single_crochet ch2 2 single_crochet in next corner chain space* repeat from * to * around omitting the last corner stitches close with a slip_stitch in first single_crochet cut yarn and weave in all ends 19 single_crochet per side 1 corner chain space design by © koernerklaus 2019 no sale no uploading on social media no publishing of excerpts from the pattern copyright is up to me
